mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HR.TBL_USER (USER_ID, USER_PW, USER_NAME, USER_GENDER, USER_BIRTH, WALK_DAY, WALK_TIME, WALK_HOUR, WALK_MINUTE, WALK_PLACE1, WALK_PLACE2, WALK_STYLE) VALUES( #{user_id}, #{user_pw}, #{user_name}, #{user_gender}, TO_DATE(#{user_birth}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{walk_day}, #{walk_time}, #{walk_hour}, #{walk_minute}, #{walk_place1}, #{walk_place2}, #{walk_style})

INSERT INTO HR.TBL_PET ( PET_NUM, USER_ID, PET_PHOTO, PET_NAME, PET_AGE, PET_GENDER, PET_BREED, ADDRESS, PET_WEIGHT, SURGERY, LIKES, DISLIKES, CHARACTER1, CHARACTER2, CHARACTER3, TIP) VALUES( SEQ_PET.NEXTVAL, #{user_id}, #{pet_photo}, #{pet_name}, #{pet_age}, #{pet_gender}, #{pet_breed}, #{address}, #{pet_weight}, #{surgery}, #{likes}, #{dislikes}, #{character1}, #{character2}, #{character3}, #{tip})
